cult.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: an extreme religious group that is not part of an established religion
cult.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a fashionable belief, idea, or attitude that influences people’s lives
cult.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Diet, exercise ... It’s all part of this cult of self-improvement.
cult.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a group of people who are very interested in a particular thing
cult.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: O'Brien has a cult of devoted readers.
cult.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: a system of religious beliefs and practices
